channel.title: Game crash?

item.title: Game crash?
item.dc:creator: @Zosedan Zosedan
item.description:
@Zosedan wrote:

The array CanCookOn[] has an index of 15, whereas the variable Cookers (the one that you looped through) has 20.

Read full topic

item.title: Game crash?
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

My error: then i use the raw fish (id 317) it show the interface then it crash i tryed to remove the interface but the game skill crashed (dcâ€™ed). I hope you guys can help me out!

Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Livo.
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 15
        at Cooking.StartCooking(Cooking.java:73)
        at Client.parseIncomingPackets(Client.java:7746)
        at Client.packetProcess(Client.java:7633)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:180)
        at Process.run(Process.java:17)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

My code:

[code] public int
Cook = 0,
CookID = 0,
Cookers = 20,
CookTime = 0,
cookz = 0,
CookerID = 0,
Preperation = 0,
CanCookOn[] = {114,2728,2729,2730,2731,2859,3039,4172,5375,8750,9682,/**/2732,11404,11405,11406},
WaterFilled = 10,
WaterSource[] = {1912,1929,1937,6712},
Fermenting[] = new int[28];

public boolean
	BadWine = false,
	IsCooking = false,
	DoneFermenting = false;
	
public void Cook(int Level, int Level2, int Raw, int Cooked, int Burned, double Exp, String Name, boolean Burnable, int ID) {
	Client c  = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[ID];
	int Percent = 25+(c.playerLevel[7]-(Level/2));
	int Chance = (int)(java.lang.Math.random()*100);
	if(c.playerLevel[7] >= Level && c.IsItemInBag(Raw) == true) {
	if(c.playerLevel[7] == Level*2.5){
		Burnable = false;
	} else {
	if(CookTime == 1) {
		c.setAnimation(Emote());
		c.deleteItem(Raw, c.GetItemSlot(Raw), 1);
		CookTime = 6;
		c.closeInterface();
		IsCooking = true;
	if(!Burnable) {
		Chance = Percent;
	}
  	if(Chance <= Percent) {
		c.addItem(Cooked, 1);
		c.addSkillXP(10, 7);
		c.sM("You successfully cook the "+c.GetItemName(Raw)+".");
	} else {
		c.addItem(Burned, 1);
		c.addSkillXP(10, 7);
		c.sM("You accidentally burn the "+c.GetItemName(Raw)+"."); } }
		}
	} else if(c.playerLevel[7] <= Level2) {
		c.sM("You need a Cooking level of "+Level+" to cook "+Name+".");
	} else {
		CookTime = 0;
	}
}

public void StartCooking(int useItemID, int atObjectID, int ID) {
	Client c  = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[ID];
	CookerID = atObjectID;
	for(int i = 0; i < Cookers; i++){
	if(IsCooking == false){
		//Raw Anchovies
        if(useItemID == 321 
		&& atObjectID == CanCookOn[i]) { 
			WWYLTM.One(useItemID,"Raw Anchovies",ID);
			CookID = 1; 
			Cook = 1; 
		
		//Raw Shrimp
		} else if (useItemID == 317 && atObjectID == CanCookOn[i]) { 
			WWYLTM.One(useItemID,"Raw Shrimps",ID); 
			CookID = 2; 
			Cook = 2;

[/code]
